key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and geopolitical tensions
Market volatility and demand fluctuations in cyclical industries
Geopolitical risks from U.S.-China trade tensions and export controls
Competitive pressures from established and emerging semiconductor firms
controversies: Reliance on Asian supply chains exposes the company to trade restrictions and regional instability
Environmental impact concerns despite sustainability commitments
environmental_issues: Resource-intensive manufacturing processes raise long-term environmental impact concerns
social_issues: Strong commitment to ethical labor practices and supply chain labor rights
governance_issues: Uncertain achievability of sustainability goals and regulatory scrutiny

sources.title: Texas Instruments Targets 100% Renewable Energy by 2030
